title: Spiced shepherd’s pie
description: This cheap, no-hassle shepherd’s pie uses ingredients straight from the freezer - no need for boiling and mashing potatoes!
ingredients: 650g/1lb 7oz frozen ready-made potato rostis or hash browns
100g/3½oz frozen chopped onion (or 1 medium onion, finely chopped)
handful chopped fresh coriander leaves, to garnish (optional)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
